nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 16 is the sixteenth issue of the comic book anthology series Star Wars Adventures. The issue was written by Chris Wyatt, Kevin Burke, and Michael Moreci, illustrated by Arianna Florean and Valentina Pinto, and released by IDW Publishing on December 19, 2018. The main story ties in to the television series Star Wars Resistance, and the backup story is part of the Flight of the Falcon publishing program.

Welcome to the Resistance! Star Wars Resistance is an exciting new animated series coming to the Disney Channel this fall, and making its Star Wars Adventures debut in this very issue! In the time before The Force Awakens, this all-new adventure follows the fledgling Resistance as it begins to realize the growing threat of the First Order!
